content: the top dc3cl from the previous round ph 2 and make a half_double_crochet into the same space half_double_crochet into the same space half_double_crochet into next 17 st s half_double_crochet into next chain 1 space take the top dc3cl from the previous round and make a half_double_crochet into the same space half_double_crochet into the same space half_double_crochet into next 17 st s × 4 times slip_stitch into 2nd chain of the beg chain 2 ph 5 fasten_off total 100 half_double_crochet copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 20 round 17 colour b/autumn yellow join your yarn into 3lp of any middle half_double_crochet from the 3 half_double_crochet group from previous round by making chain 2 count as half_double_crochet ph 1 2 half_double_crochet into the same 3lp st half_double_crochet into next 19 3lp st 3 half_double_crochet into next 3lp of middle half_double_crochet from the 3 half_double_crochet group half_double_crochet into the next 19 3lp st × 4 times slip_stitch into 2nd chain of the beg chain 2 ph 5 fasten_off total 110 half_double_crochet copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 21 copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 22 if you want to make a blanket or throw then follow this structure to join your pentagon s copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 23 wonderful…… we have come to the end of our adventure i hope you all had a great time with this pattern i am leaving you all here until we meet again on new adventures bye bye………… sadika copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan
